about_the_game:
Grow from a tiny tadpole to cosmic menace in Toadled: Eating Frenzy, this frantic action clicker roguelike. Test your reflexes and make smart choices as you upgrade through hundreds of new mutation combos!

When a toad gains the ability to mutate with everything he eats, his goal becomes clear: devour the entire universe. Whether you’re a longtime fan or hopping in for the first time, Toadled: Eating Frenzy is packed with frenetic fun, goofy charm, and plenty of surprises to keep you on your toes!

Eat, Grow, Mutate 🍽️

From strange, hideous to wondrous toad forms, each bite makes you stronger and weirder. Ever wonder what a human tastes like? Or if a nuclear missile causes heartburn? With over 40 different enemies to devour, there’s always something new to discover.

Upgrade Like Never Before ⏫

Build the ultimate toad with new mutations, buddies, and item combos. Turtle shell saw blades? Lightning tongue? Mix and match your upgrades and discover new, wacky ways to dominate each run. Each playthrough is a fresh opportunity to try something new.

All-New Features, Endless Mayhem 💯

With a flexible upgrade system, new buddies to help you, and stages packed with surprises, the action never lets up. Plus, dress up your toad in ridiculous hats and other gear by dominating challenges and rising to the top of the leaderboards. Want to stand out? You'll need both style and skill.

Join The Adventure 👋

Ready to join the frenzy? Add Toadled: Eating Frenzy to your wishlist now and follow us for the latest updates, sneak peeks, and exclusive content. The adventure is just beginning—don’t miss out!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: Toadled: Eating Frenzy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews:
“I wanna find out what's happening to this frog, you know? I think that's the best part about this game. (...) And I also like that you can upgrade. Upgrading is nice.”
MattShea

“I think evolution took a wrong step here because we have more heads than I think we should but we've already eaten a deer and... I think that was a koala? I don't really know what it was. I don't really care. If it's alive it's going in my mouth.”
DangerouslyFunny
short_description: Grow from a tiny tadpole to cosmic menace in Toadled: Eating Frenzy, the remastered frantic action clicker roguelike. Test your reflexes and make smart choices as you upgrade through hundreds of new mutation combos!
